title: Kill Raphael's Old Enemy
content: st outside Grand Mausoleum (Thorm Mausoleum). Bring Astarion with you to learn more info from the devil. The enemy Raphael seek to kill hides in the Gauntlet of Shar. You can reach Gauntlet through Grand Mausoleum, Reithwin Graveyard. In order to reveal the path, you need to press the buttons under the 3 paintings in the following order: Moonrise Towers, Grief, General. (You can find the clue in a book in that region.)
